0.1.0.name: wordpress/odesk-rss-jobs-affiliate
0.1.0.description:
This plugin requires Commision Junction Account (Publisher) to earn commision when someone got hired through your listing link.
If you do not have one, please signup http://www.cj.com/get-started-publisher?x.

Please follow the link below to view the live action of the plugin: http://reygcalantaol.com/odesk-rss-job-affiliate-jobs
